headless.hostname_get_command: cd headless && vagrant ssh-config | grep HostName | awk '{print$NF}'
headless.port_get_command: cd headless && vagrant ssh-config | grep Port | awk '{print$NF}'

workstation.hostname_get_command: cd gui && vagrant ssh-config | grep HostName | awk '{print$NF}'
workstation.port_get_command: cd gui && vagrant ssh-config | grep Port | awk '{print$NF}'

htpc.hostname_get_command: cd gui && vagrant ssh-config | grep HostName | awk '{print$NF}'
htpc.port_get_command: cd gui && vagrant ssh-config | grep Port | awk '{print$NF}'

headless.start_instance_command: cd ubuntu64 && chmod 0600 insecure_key && ssh-add insecure_key && sudo docker build -t raptiformica-baseimage . && sudo docker run --privileged -d raptiformica-baseimage > container_id && sleep 5
headless.hostname_get_command: bash -c "cd ubuntu64 && sudo docker inspect -f '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' $(cat ubuntu64/container_id)" | tail -n 1

workstation.hostname_get_command: bash -c "cd ubuntu64 && sudo docker inspect -f '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' $(cat ubuntu64/container_id)" | tail -n 1
